subject: Attention
body:
Attention  
My name is  Kevin Earl from United Nations Abandon Consignment Recovery  Unit. l am contacting you in regard to your consignment that contains 3.6 Million USD and 12 kilo gram Gold Bar that is in our Custody  which was Abandoned by greedy U N Diplomat. Right now all arrangements have been made to release your consignment. So please get back to me immediately
TAKE NOTE; This consignment is free of any illegal threat, 
the UN has mapped out this consignment to be delivered to you.
Name:  Kevin Earl
I await your positive acknowledgment.

subject: Re:  Attention
body:
Dear Kevin Earl,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I am surprised to hear about this abandoned package containing a large sum of money and gold bars. Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did the package end up in your custody and why was it abandoned?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Karen
